DataElement.preferredName: Main Clinical Trial Registration Healthcare Facility Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the name or identifier of the main healthcare facility or institution registering a person on a research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Main Clinical Trial Registration Healthcare Facility Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the name or identifier of the main healthcare facility or institution registering a person on a research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Main Clinical Trial Registration Healthcare Facility
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Most important; principal.:A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.:The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.:The buildings and organizations where healthcare services are provided.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.
The buildings and organizations where healthcare services are provided.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the name of a healthcare facility.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: groups, institutions, or clinical facilities that conduct clinical research or tests, or analyze clinical data.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.
